word: IT WAS THE CHERISHED PLAN OF MRS. WHITE TO PREPARE FOR PUBLICATION SEVERAL SMALL VOLUMES, CONTAINING IN THE FEWEST PAGES, THE MIGHTY, SOUL-SAVING TRUTH SHE LOVED TO REPEAT TO THE PEOPLE BY VOICE AND PEN. AND THE INITIAL STEPS IN THE COMPILATION OF THESE VOLUMES WERE TAKEN A SHORT TIME BEFORE HER DEATH. THE BEGINNING OF THE COMPILATION OF THIS VOLUME WAS A GREAT JOY TO HER. BUT SHE DID NOT LIVE TO SEE ITS COMPLETION.
